name: Recipe: Sunset Earring
description: A recipe to make a Sunset Earring.

name: Stick of Nomad Incense
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Smoky, sweet, and luxurious, this smell will remind you of the desert winds forever.</c>

name: Cleric's Green Wood Staff of Smoldering
Junundu Bezoar
description: Double-click to open.

name: Grenth's Regalia Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Elonian Matchlock
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Royal Funerary Coat Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Cave Creature Meat
description: Task item. Give it to raptors as a tasty treat, or put it in the food baskets for Aksim to use later. Seems gross, but hey, they like it.

name: Sliver of Vlast
description: A crystalline sliver that Vlast lost during combat. Follower Adisa is collecting them in the Ustulate Barrens in the Elon Riverlands.

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Helmet Casing
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Helms.

name: Sandstorm Flush Hand
description: Double-click to open your prize and gain special rewards and valuable junk items in random amounts.

name: 32-Slot Orichalcum Locker
description:
32 Slots

Can be exchanged for a non-soulbound version at merchants in Amnoon.

name: Pega, Who Fattens the Vulture of Severance
Reinforced Tack
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The flag of Amnoon pays homage to its naval history.</c>

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Pauldrons
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Pauldrons recipe.

name: Crabmeat
description: Task item. Give it to raptors as a tasty treat, or put it in the food baskets for Aksim to use later.

name: Recipe: Brandspark Ring
description: A recipe to make a Brandspark Ring.

name: Riddle of the Scourge
description: <c=@Flavor>For some destinations, the best guide is one who's never completed the journey.</c>

name: Haimi's Riding Boots of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Chains of Subordination of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Mini Awakened Mummy
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Divine Reliquary
description: Double-click to open.

name: Mini Renegade Gorea Halfcut
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Florid Bouquet
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and may be sold to vendors.

<c=@Flavor>The Primeval gardens were full of rare flowers. An entire priesthood was devoted to finding and naming them.</c>

name: Heap of Sulphurous Slag
description: <c=@Flavor>Industrial detritus abounds in the Desolation, with army after army pillaging the land for material.</c>

name: Champion's Sun
description:
Double-click to display your Champion's Sun.
This sun was earned by prevailing at the highest levels of competition in the Mists.

name: Mini Desert Vulture
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Black Lion Exclusives Chest
description:
Double-click to choose a Black Lion Chest exclusive item. Once chosen, the item will be account bound.
Last Update: August 2021.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Carver
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear carver recipe.

name: Elonian Cairn Stones
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Anniversary Backpack and Weapon Pack Combo
description: Double-click to gain one Anniversary Backpack Pack and two Anniversary Weapon Packs.

name: Dwarven Shield Half Set of Spikes
description: A broken piece of a dwarven shield.

name: Soldier's Tempered Scale Pauldrons of the Warrior
Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Shoes
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Jerkin
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Record of League Participation
description: Combine with Condensed Spirit Energy, Star of Glory, and Jar of Distilled Glory in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of Competitive Dedication.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Mask
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Rampager's Subterfuge Hood of the Thief
Garden of the Gods Page 07
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 2
Elonian Smasher
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Rampager's Rascal Shoulders of the Thief
Divine Passage
description: By rebuilding the sanctuary, you will be granted access to Kormir's sanctum.

name: Salvageable Intact Forged Scrap
description:
Salvage Item
<c=@flavor>Chunks of metal used by the tortured spirits of Balthazar's Forged army.</c>

name: Ancient Tusk
description:
Grants a moderate amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>Elders tell tales of the giants that used to roam this far south.  </c>

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Gauntlets
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Gauntlets recipe.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Breastplate
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Kormir's Library Key
description: Used to open chests containing lost Sunspear writings.

name: Mournstone
description: Double-click to apply to an accessory, amulet, or ring with an unused upgrade slot.

name: Anniversary Lounge Choosy Box
description: Double-click to choose a two-week pass to one of the lounges.

name: Warbeast Hardened Longcoat Padding
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Coats.

name: Forged Bow Skin
description:
This will replace the appearance of one longbow and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This longbow skin has no stats of its own.

name: Attuned Dunkoro's Treasure (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: 24-Slot Hardened Leather Pannier
description: 24 Slots

name: Feline Dispersing Emitter
description: The inscription claims this can harmlessly dissuade any domesticated cat from loitering in your residence. Purchase price includes immediate installation in your home.

name: Hastily Written Letter
description: This thank-you note from Tasa and Aksim came with a pair of ornate, well-made riding gloves. It also suggests speaking with the priestess at the Marifa refugee camp outside of Amnoon.

name: Handful of Kournan Coins
description:
Grants a small amount of Crystal Desert Mastery experience.

<c=@Flavor>Formerly traded across Elona, but banned under Palawa Joko. These are still valued by collectors, scholars, and thieves.</c>

name: Dollop of Choya Harissa
description: <c=@Flavor>A flavorful sauce made from ground needles, from a recipe invented by the choya.</c>

name: Might of the Vindictive of Severance
Zaishen Relic
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>These were unseen for a generation, but lately the warrior-monks of Balthazar have been placing these to signify their return.</c>

name: Wish for Freedom
description: Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.

name: Luminous Brunt
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

name: Carrion Winged Pants of the Necromancer
Haimi's Dusty Crown of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Rampager's Winged Boots of the Elementalist
Rusty Pitchfork
description: <c=@Flavor>"Make hay while the guards watch," or so the local idiom has it.</c>

name: Ogre Supply Case
description: A crate of supplies that should be taken to Ollgi in Lommuld Kraal.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Gauntlets
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Boot Casing
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Boots.

name: Southsun Beach Mini Container
description: Contains the Southsun Kasmeer and Southsun Faren minis.

name: Knight's Winged Gloves of the Mesmer
Carrion Winged Mantle of the Necromancer
Bunch of Rare Grapes
description: Double-click to turn 10 Bunches of Rare Grapes into a Bushel of Ancient Elon Grapes.

name: Dwarven Hammer Rune
description: A broken piece of a dwarven war hammer.

name: Zephyrite Box of Dreams
description: Contains the Sun Catcher, Wind Catcher, and Lightning Catcher backpack skins.

name: Assassin's Rascal Pants of the Ranger
Hamaseen Cloth Crate
description:
Can contain jute and wool scraps.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Wish for Accuracy
description: Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.

name: Rabid Rascal Boots of the Engineer
Intelligence Report: Palawa Joko I Page 02
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Bottle of Sahlahjar's Choice
description: <c=@Flavor>Sweet and cloying, with an almost copper finish.</c>

name: Sliver of Twitching Forgemetal
description:
Used in crafting armor in the Crystal Desert.

<c=@flavor>Whatever energy animated this metal remains in some small, malevolent form.</c>

name: Springer Snare
description:
Grants a small amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>These things never work, but that hasn't stopped people from trying.</c>

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Jerkin
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Jerkin recipe.

name: Kole's Tormented Eye (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Exuberant Dye Kit
description: Double-click to choose from a large selection of account-bound dyes.

name: Trophy of the Champion Soulbeast
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Carrion Winged Boots of the Necromancer
Balthazar's Sealed Cask
description: Double-click to open.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Mask
description: A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Mask.

name: Awakened Intel
description: Awakened documents that will aid the djinn in their fight against Joko.

name: Attuned Kole's Tormented Eye
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Coin of Lies
description:
Grants a small amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>An old superstition, now with the force of ritual, says that for every lie, a price must be paid.</c>

name: Elonian Cutlass
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

Soldier's Tempered Scale Greaves of the Warrior

name: The Legacy Page 02
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

Recipe: Superior Rune of the Mirage
Chest of the Second Room
description: Double-click to open.

name: Brass Airfoil
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The Sunspear banner remains a symbol of heroism and unity.</c>

name: Elonian Hawk Statue
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Assassin's Rascal Coat of the Ranger
Sentient Seed
description: Double-click to open.

name: Superior Rune of the Holosmith
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Gain a laser-disc when struck below the 75% health threshold. <c=@reminder> (Cooldown: 45s)</c>

name: Scarab Meat
description: Task item. Maybe the choya chef would want it.

name: Warbeast Gossamer Shoe Upper
description: Used to craft Gossamer Boots.

name: Cosmetics Palette
description: <c=@Flavor>The citizens of Vabbi are known for their use of exquisite cosmetics.</c>

name: Salomon's Raptor-Handling Gloves of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Mini Spellbreaker Tamela Okar
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Junundu Wurm
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Elonian Matrix
description: Sold by master scribes.

name: Red Lentil and Flatbread Feast
description: Snack Feast: Double-click to set out a Feast of Red Lentil and Flatbread to share with anyone in the area. Feast stays active for 5 minutes.

name: Bolt of Homespun Brocade
description: <c=@Flavor>The Elon Riverlands are home to generations of traditional artisans.</c>

name: Recipe: Mordant Cesta
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Cesta recipe.

name: Vibrant Dye Kit
description: Double-click to choose an account-bound, exclusive dye from this pack.

name: Recipe: Mordant Longbow
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Longbow recipe.

Geomancer Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Scutum recipe.

description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Largos Fin Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Awakened Intel
description: Awakened documents that will aid the djinn in their fight against Joko.

name: Tale of Back Home
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Stories of life back home, even when it's not your home, can warm the heart and restore hope when things are grim.</c>

name: Sunspear Order Emblem
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Restore faith in the Order of the Sunspears by recovering this ancient relic.</c>

name: Elonian Warsickle
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Marshal's Elonian Boots
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Mini Earth Djinn
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Tasset
description: A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Tasset.

name: False Vision Crystal
description:
Grants a moderate amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>Preying on seekers of Ascension is a timeworn grift for both local hustlers and foreign mountebanks.</c>

name: Show of Support: Augury Rock
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of trade contracts.
<c=@Flavor>By supporting their allies, you can strengthen ties between Amnoon and the Sunspears.</c>

name: Recipe: Superior Rune of the Spellbreaker
